name: All Guns On Deck
description: All Guns On Deck is a naval strategy, real time tactics action rpg with a unique battle system and unforgiving world to conquer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Generic Sound Device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista, XP Processor: Intel® Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Generic Sound Device
